participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Calm and introspective, she values inner peace and self-discovery.
participant_1.background: i live in alaska. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i am a buddhist. i have not spoken in three months. i like meditation.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Curious and outgoing, he enjoys connecting with others and exploring new ideas.
participant_2.background: i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. my parents taught me survival skills. i am also a graduate student. i walk dogs for a living. i'm an avid kayaker.

content.text: I'm not gon na let you go.
What do you feel about my person? I love to read, I am a bit of a yoga instructor.
